title: 06/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
After Giannis Antetokounmpo goes down with an injury, Colin explains why all the injured super stars in the NBA hasn’t actually affected the outcomes in the NBA playoffs. He addresses the criticism Paul George has faced for his playoff performances and why he should actually be accepting them as a compliment. He also believes the Dallas Cowboys are already destined to disappoint in the 2021 NFL season. Plus, NBA veteran Quentin Richardson joins the show to preview the Suns vs Clippers series and shares some great stories about poorly run NBA teams.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
